explosives.rationale: There are no chemical groups associated with explosive properties present in the molecules.

self_reactive_substances.rationale: There are no chemical groups associated with explosive or self-reactive properties present in the molecule.

self_heating_substances.rationale: Test methods applicable to liquid substances are not available

substances_mixtures_emit_flammable_gas_i.hazard_name: Substances and mixtures, which in contact with water, emit flammable gases
substances_mixtures_emit_flammable_gas_i.rationale: The chemical structure of the substance does not contain metals or metaloids(B, Si, P, Ge, As, Se, Sn, Sb, Te, Bi, Po, At).

oxidizing_liquids.rationale: Organic compounds containing oxygen (but not chlorine and fluorine) chemically bonded only to carbon and hydrogen (but not to other elements).

corrosive_to_metals.rationale: Although there is information that it corrodes copper etc. (HSDB (2005)), there is no data based on set test methods.

acute_toxicity_oral.rationale: Not classified because of SPECIES: Rat; ENDPOINT: LD50; VALUE: : approximately 6000mg/kg; REFERENCE SOURCE: ACGIH 7th, 2001)

acute_toxicity_dermal.rationale: Based on rabbit LD50 value: 6000mg/kg (ACGIH 7th, 2001), and outline fatal dose: 17000mg/kg (ACGIH 7th, 2001), it was set as the outside of Category.

acute_toxicity_inhalation_dust.rationale: From description that a toxic phenomena was not acknowledged in 3900ppm of 6-hour exposure (4-hour equivalent 10.75mg/L) in the inhalation exposure test of the mist using the rat (ACGIH (7th, 2001)), it was set as the outside of Category.

skin_corrosion_irritation.rationale: It was set as Category 3 from description that slight transient skin irritations was admitted in the test using the guinea-pig (ACGIH (7th, 2001)).

serious_eye_damage_irritation.rationale: We classified it as Category 2B based on the description that the very slight transient stimulant action was acknowledged in the test applied to the eyes of the rabbits (ACGIH (7th, 2001)).

respiratory_skin_sensitizer.classification: Respiratory sensitization: Classification not possible; Skin sensitization: Classification not possible
respiratory_skin_sensitizer.rationale: Respiratory organ: No data. Skin: Although we found the description that skin sensitizing property was not acknowledged in the test using the guinea pigs in ACGIH (7th, 2001), we presupposed that we could not classify it since the test method is unknown and sufficient data to classify it as Out Of Category was not obtained.

germ_cell_mutagenicity.rationale: There was a negative result by the micronucleus test which used the mouse red corpuscles, which are the in vivo mutagenicity tests using a somatic (NTP DB, 2005). So it carried out the outside of Category.

toxic_to_reproduction.rationale: In the oral administration study using pregnancy rats and rabbits in the NTP DB (2005), there is a description that specific reproductive toxicity was not observed at the dose in which general toxicity is observed in parental animals. Therefore, it was out of the Category. Moreover, there is no descriptions on general toxicity of parent animals in the ACGIH (7th, 2001). However, there is a description that reproductive toxicity was not observed in the percutaneous administration examination using pregnant mice and rats. Specific reproductive toxicity was not also observed in the oral administration fertility study using the male and female mice in NTP DB (2005).

systemic_toxicity_single_exposure.hazard_name: Specific target organs/systemic toxicity following single exposure
systemic_toxicity_single_exposure.rationale: There was a description in ACGIH (7th, 2001) referring to that toxic phenomena were not confirmed at high concentrations beyond the guidance value limits of Category 2 in mist inhalation exposure tests using rats, while there is no other data, and determined that it cannot be classified as out of Category because of lack of data.

systemic_toxicity_repeat_exposure.hazard_name: Specific target organs/systemic toxicity following repeated exposure
systemic_toxicity_repeat_exposure.rationale: Although there was description that toxic effect was not observed with the dosage within the guidance value range for Category 2 in 90 day dermal administration test on rats (ACGIH (7th, 2001)), since there was no other data which clearly deny hazard with Priority 1, it was presupposed that data is insufficient and it cannot classified as out of Category.

acute_aquatic_toxicity.rationale: It carried out the outside of Category from 96-hour LC50>100 mg/L of fishes (Oryzias latipes) (MOE eco-toxicity tests of chemicals, 1998).

chronic_aquatic_toxicity.rationale: Since not water-insoluble (water solubility=1.00*106mg/L(PHYSPROP Database, 2005)) and acute toxicity is low.
